review: Love this hotel
This hotel is amazing clean, modern and the staff is too good. Thumbs up to Novotel
X
Very clean and food was excellent.Staff were friendly.

Brand new hotel close to the airport , rooms very clean at Novotel standard , check-in out fast and smooth staff very friendly and professional all around . Only minus F&B  overpriced, paid 8000 over INR for a bottle of wine marked 1600 MRP , + tax + service ‚Ä¶ definitely overpriced .

Service was amazing in the hotel, very comfortable room, varied breakfast. Location was convenient as we had a very early flight however far from main attractions. The best was the people. A big shout out to Sneha and Rohit who made us feel so welcomed!

Took half an hour for me to check in as i cudnt get the key physical coz they use virtual key. Cudnt get double bed as they wanted to offer 2 single bed. Dint treat me like a 5 star guest at 5 start hotle
Clean hotel and good location

Our stay at Novotel Andheri Mumbai was average. While the location is convenient, and the rooms were clean, the service could have been more attentive. There were some delays in response times, and the dining options were just about satisfactory. It's a decent option for a short stay, but there's definitely room for improvement in overall guest experience.

My stay at Novotel Andheri Mumbai was average. While the location is convenient, and the rooms were clean, the service could have been more attentive. There were some delays in response times, and the staff at reception was too busy. It's a decent option for a short stay, but there's definitely room for improvement in overall guest experience.
This Novotel‚Äôs a no-brainer
Awesome stay

Hotel is nice. All staff were courteous including in cafe, front desk, and  restaurant.
I surely recommend breakfast at hotel. 

I enjoyed quiet stay and large room.

I and my husband had a stay in your hotel recently. On our way to your hotel I lost my mobile phone in a OLE car. I was there for a business meeting and had every details in my mobile of my clients. From you entrance security guards to your reception staff everyone was very helpful in every way. You really have the best team.¬†

Ms Sugandh and another staff from the reception i didn't get her name was very comforting and handle the situation so well and she recommended us to Mr Bhushan and was keep telling us he will try to help us find the phone.

Mr Bhushan went very far to find our mobile phone and made things so easy for us and he was well knowledge men and helpful men. We being not local and a tourist and not knowing anyone in the city it was very helpful of Bhushan and he and your team surely deserve the best appreciation.¬†

I was so stressed and went to your 2nd¬†floor restaurant to have some food to make myself feel better. I meet this waiter I didn't get his name he made me feel so better by talking to me and telling me I will get the handphone back don't worry. And he recommended the best chicken biryani which i have never ate before in my life it was the best. As for the breakfast 2 guys were so helpful too and your restaurant does a good job by giving us good food and a big spread.
Rooms and towels were very clean, the staff was very friendly at breakfast and dinner.  We were traveling with 2 kids and the hotel was quite nice.
Very Polite staff well organised everythings gud hygiene
Hotel room was big and clean. Bed was big and comfortable. Breakfast had a good spread.

They gave me a room on the 10th floor and the 11th floor had party everyday and it was so noisy, when I called in, they said it will stop by 11.30pm and I'm able to sleep after that. Having visiting mumbai for business, I turn in to bed by 10pm so that I can start my day early. But suffered for 3nights there. Communicated it with the staff but all they had was just apologies and no solution. Party ends at 11.30pm. But then the cleaning starts upto 2/3am. Ridiculous how they manage all this.
I had paid for three person in advance but they put towel and other things like toothbrush water bottles for only two person that is only problem otherwise it‚Äôs very good stay

I had issues wt my shower head . Water goes all over . Toiletries are not replenished although they. Lean the room . Bedsheets are old with tiny balls on the cover so it‚Äôs rough to your skin . Breakfast is good .
Below par
My stay was very nice. Best place to visit in mumbai for stay and the hotel staff is so helpful and friendly They provide us a best service thank you . Happy to visit again.

Two day visit early June. Good points: excellent staff and service,  clean and nice room. Restaurant is good, the food variety is good though not enormous, probably more veg options than nonveg. 

To improve: small niggles in the room: bed not precisely alligned, bathroom door difficult to lock, safe having software error, toilet shower having too much pressure, flush water leaking a little.
Overall a good experience!!

Room is spacious.
But overall lot of improvements can be done.
Reception staff was not well versed with the checkin process. Initially they have given me in too floor, then due to room door lock issue changed to another floor.
In that room as usual TV was having issue - but the operator came and did the repair and made okay, they were good in work. Toilet also wash area water was not flowing fast, somewhere some block was there.

Bed was cozy, so sleep was good.
Once you are checked in calling for maintenance and waiting for the repair all these are frustrating, better give a well condition room on the first place.
Lovely stay, lovely rooms

The room was spacious to accommodate three adults. 24/7 Cafe with a variety of affordable snacks.

Room service, cleanliness and hygiene was world class.
Had good experience to stay there

This is a brand new hotel and I am staying here for the 2nd time. Last time I stayed in room opposite the metro station  which was great, but for this stay my view was  not so good with hutments but with mountains far away ‚Ä¶ the rising sun was a treat to watch.  Everything is good except the gym which can be upgraded to include more equipment. My last review was for the gym too and nothing much has changed here from that review.

The hotel is nearby a metro station just just within 1 mim walking. Their breakfast is good. The hotel is close to the airport around 2km distance. If taking a pre-paid taxi from the airport to the hotel is less than 300 Indian rupees. Really recommend this hotel to international visitors when staying in Mumbai, India.üëçüèªüëçüèª
Nice food and nice room
Awesome hotel. One of the best available in its price range. Clean and good facility and very friendly staff with great food and breakfast buffet.
Food for breakfast has wide selection. Very near the airport
Nice location and nice staff
superb breakfast  nice  atmosphere good one.
Location is perfect near the airport. Room is spacious, clean and the bath is amazing. The service, the breakfast are one of the kind
One of the best stays around Mumbai International airport. The property is extremely well maintained & the staff is very professional and hospitable.
It‚Äôs good clean and very close to airport. Just beware of food

great for location to the terminal , short ride, rooms are large and modern, and clean, 
ill say check in is not as straight forward or streamlines especially of you have multiple rooms under your name ..
We had an excellent stay at the hotel. The staff members were very good and excellent services.
Excellent Stay

Decent hotel near Mumbai airport. Good food and courteous staff.

Please note that the check in time is 3PM and they will make you wait if you arrive a bit early. I was asked to wait over an hour in the lobby.

I recently stayed at this property and had an excellent experience. The location was convenient, being close to the airport. The hotel was spotlessly clean and well-maintained. The staff were friendly, attentive, and provided exceptional service. The facilities were top-notch, offering everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Overall, it was great value for money and I highly recommend this property.
The stay was good and comfortable. Not much variety in buffet but overall good value.

The stay was nice. Room was clean and so was the bathroom. 
The staff is good too. Reservation team needs to be more friendly.
Very good service, staff are very cooperative. Nice hotel üëçüèΩ

Located at close proximity to the airport, the hotel is a great option for those wanting a place near the airport.

The Novotel brand is one of my favourites all over the world, and this one maintains the standards as well. 

Excellent rooms with comfortable beds.

The staff was very helpful and welcoming. They ensuring I didn't have to wait for too long. Since it was a festive period they even offered sweets, which was a nice gesture. 

The hotel has all the facilities one needs. The breakfast buffet is top notch with plenty of options for all.

Overall, I can easily recommend this hotel if you are looking to stay in Andheri and close to the airport

We spent three nights at the Novotel in total. 
The staff were wonderful, very helpful and polite. They even remembered us the second time we stayed.  
The rooms were spacious, clean and had everything we needed. 
Very convenient for the new metro system as Aiport Rd station is directly outside.
Worst services
Such a modern and clean hotel with the best food I had. Food was even better than tajmahal palace
Good hotel. I would like express big thanks to Ms. Subhani especially DJ Swastic at 12th floor Bar. Best wishes all

We had a lovely experience at Novotel Mumbai. Very clean and staff very accommodating. We arrived a few hours before checkin due to our flight arrival time and the staff were very friendly and got our room ready and available earlier than checkin so we didn‚Äôt have  to hang about waiting for the room. Gym facilities were great and location was perfect as close to the airport and also easily accessible to other areas of Mumbai.

Very convenient location, close to airport and Metro (it's the next door). Rooms are big and good view from the rooms.

Staff are polite and helpful as per your needs.

Thank you to Saurabh, Youna, Dheeraj and Raju for taking special care and helping us to assist our special requests.
It's best in all very clean and clear world class
It's NOVOTEL ......that's it üëç

Hardly spent 2 full nights however checkin process was easy, app can unlock doors or access elevators was cool. Didn't much interact with housekeeping . Lobby staff and security were welcoming . A classy stay
Pleasant experience with no complaints with the hotel.
Very nice hotel best service
Very good.

Very disappointed with the housekeeping services
The staff at Reception and other staff members in the restaurant 
The service was not up to the mark
The staff dint speak courteously amongst each other how can one expect them to be in the hospitality industry and serve clients  to their satisfaction so that they visit again,
Good for business traveller
Good location easy to approach public transportation. Clean and convenience hotel

A convenient location close to the airport, friendly and professional staff, various and convenient facilities, and clean accommodations make it an overall cost-effective place to stay.

It seems suitable for various people, including those on business trips and travel.
Excellent Stay
Excellent Stay.
The breakfast buffet was not as lavish as Delhi Aerocity novotel neither the hotel size. But overall, typical nice and comfortable Novotel stay.
It's top notch in every thing. Fabulous and laxurios
Brand new, excellent service, close to airport

The rooms are clean and big. The breakfast choices is wide and taste great.  It is conveniently located near the airport around 5 to 10 mins drive depending on traffic. It has a metro beside it but there is no disturbance.  It is value for money and I will chose and stay here again.

It was a decent and comfortable stay at hotel.
There are some improvement areas esp in the the food department - the taste/quality was less than average. But other than that there were no issues.

I had a very comfortable stay at the hotel. Every minor detail was taken care of. The staff is friendly, courteous and very helpful. The rooms are super clean and well maintained. Security is given a great deal of importance and put my mind at ease as a solo female traveller. Food is excellent, held to a very high standard and they always offer you with an elaborate spread no matter what you order. Highly recommend Novotel, Mumbai.
Located at Airport Road Metro Station, this Novotel property is relatively quite new and wonderfully done. The property is very near to the airport and the interiors as well are very modern.

The hotel is brand new with marble all over.   Spacious and comfortable.    The staff is what makes the place exceptional.  From the reception, dinning room and porters they all were focused on giving the guest an exceptional experience.  This hotel deserves a FIVE star hotel rating.    You are staying at 5 star value but pay 3 star price

I WAS BOOKING SMOKING ROOM AND WHEN I WAS ENTER IN PROPERTY AND CHECK IN TIME HOTEL STAFF WAS TOLD IN OUR PROPERTY NO SMOKING OUR PROPERTY IS FULLY NON SMOKING PROPERTTY BUT WHENEVER I WAS BOOK BY AGODA IN THIS APP SHOWING ROOM IS SMOKING AVAILBLE AND ALSO STAFF BEHAVIOUR IS VERY RUDE ALSO MANAGER
We had an amazing time here. Staff is very friendly, great location. Food needs a bit of improvement.
Spacious, bright and very clean room. Excellent house keeping by Hussain. Excellent breakfast service by Nikhil and Priyal. Definitely will be here again when in Mumbai.
Joshua was wonderful to give us the full support for our late flights and also taxi service to travel around. lovely rooftop bar too with nice waitress.

ive been stayed in different novotel, and yes similarities and differences are there, yet one thing that Novotel andheri east(near mumbai airport) different from other hotels are the people,  the staff will make you comfortable in every needs, specially to lobby manager named Tejal, who corrected some of my reservations, and also to the chef at gourmet restaurant, chef Soraj, who made the food in my all means, he made it possible just to meet my needs. thank you chef.

Quick check in and check out
Nice property Nice location supab food & facilities

I loved this hotel!  There is a lovely rooftop infinity pool and the fitness room has a city view with big windows.  The music is a bit too loud in the restaurant so I chose to eat in my room, but the decor in the restaurant looked lovely. Excellent, attentive and kind staff.  Spotlessly clean and you can't beat the location: 5 min from T2 International terminal BOM.
Had a great stay at this hotel. Rohan at the front desk was very helpful and made the check in process very easy and accommodated all my request.
Friendly staff, good food, great location, love this place
Great hotel and did a beautiful deco for our Birthday. Really Appreciate the hotel staff. Will definitely come back.
Good Hotel however a non smoking hotel completely
Clean and good location
Novotel stays would always be perfect.  Nothing to complain of.  Novotel staff ensure every single aspect of hospitality is effectively practiced so the guests witness the 5-star experience.

I stayed on 1st April. The hotel is sparklingly clean and the staffs are super kind.
One glitch was in the food which was managed extremely well by the staffs.

Second stay was from 13th to 17th April.
Again, everything was smooth. But I believe there is a lack of communication between staffs. You need to fix that. I was supposed to get 20% on food and beverages but nothing like that was given even after said that we are allocated the 20% on every food we order from the restaurant. Neither a reimbursement was made. 
And again, there was a major glitch in the food which I don't want to mention.

A 5 star hotel cannot do such mistakes. It's horrible as we are paying a huge sum of money to stay there.

One thing was good that the restaurant in charge as well as the chef came personally to the room to apologize and they provided some desserts which we didn't take as we were not craving for free things but to get the high standards we paid for specially for the food.

Overall, the stay was excellent. I loved the cleanliness.
Some people have commented that they see slums nearby and people just keep staring at them. I will deny this. To me, seeing those slums (small houses) made me feel more humble. We are all humans. Having some compassion in the heart is always good for every kind of people.

I will definitely stay in the hotel next time provided the restaurant staff make sure they don't repeat such a horrible mistake 3rd time with us.
Top notch service, improved by a well maintained facility. I could almost live there!

Need to provide a king size bed if u have an infant the bed is not sufficient 
Rest the hotel is newly opened 
Loved the service 
Need to have more variety in breakfast
Best stay in mumbai. The room was as shown in the picture. It was veryy clean and highly maintained. We had an amazing stay. I highly recommend this hotel as the location is close to mumbai airport.
Although it had been requested to Agoda, luckily hotel arranged an immediate pick-up, after called hotel directly.

The hotel was impeccable. Though there has been a glitch in between, nevertheless the staffs handled it very much professionally. Clean and remarkable. Worth the money for sure. Looking to stay there soon.
Clean and friendly staff..
well maintained hotel, good food
Definitely good location, friendly staff. Felt safe as a female solo traveller. Will be back again due to the accessibility and how close it is from the airport.
everything good

Everything was beyond our expectations.Friendly staff clean hotel ,our suite was so comfortable and spacious...felt like alittle apartment.Breakfast packs were prepared for us with such pleasure as our flight was very early in the morning.Bed was very comfortable.Bathroomvery spacious .We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Novotel Mumbai International hotel.
Food n Spa&Massage discount

I wish all hotels were this beautiful and new, where the customer service from staff was 10/10. I will always want to stay here and I wish I could have stayed longer. Amazing hospitality, and the rooms were new and clean. The bathroom was really nice too. Don‚Äôt book any other airport hotel but this one. It was the best.
Loved everything, the staff is super polite!
It's the first visit and impressed with the hotel.

The staff was most helpful. They accommodated us with an early checkin and late checkout at no charge.  
Rooms are soundproof, great pool, excellent breakfast. 
Clean rooms and great beds. 
Overall a really good experience.
Service received made me feel so valued. Amazing interiors. Staff were ever so polite. Had an absolutely brilliant stay! Would definitely recommend to anyone.

New Hotel. V Clean Rooms. Food quality is just excellent. Hotel staff is very accomodating of all guest requests. The culinary department is remarkable. A bit of delays during check in and check out. Other than that its an excellent place to stay. Highly recommend.
Good stay..good breakfast however there could be improvement in lunch

Room Service Apps not user friendly,  has room to improve

Very closely situated near the airport, this newly opened hotel of Accor group is a class of its own. Quite a spacious one considering the space constraint in Mumbai, the rooms were elegant and the stay fantastic....the restaurant in the first floor was quite tasty, though priced a bit expensive..
I stay here for 3 night .it was very wonderful days and the staff is very nice and cooerative

We were staying just for a night and are sure we will be back to Novotel soon! Highly recommended for their warm, supportive and hugely cooperative staff!

Excellent decor! Comfortable beds .  Great bathroom and shower.  Easy access to malls and airport.  Metro station at the location.

It was like a fresh breath of air after i checked in. The lady at the reception was quite good and friendly. She escorted us everywhere and kept asking if we needed something.

I wanted to decorate the room for a friend‚Äôs birthday, but the management caused a lot of difficulties initially as they told me ‚Äòoutside decor items aren‚Äôt allowed‚Äô. Courteous staff, always available to help you out with a smile at any hour. Super clean and spacious rooms, lobby and eating areas. Breakfast has a lot of options but I would recommend working on the overall taste. Still not at par with the offerings by competitors.
Its a five star hotel. Need to food verity

The hotel location made it easy to explore the city.  The driver, Ahmid, was pleasant and navigated the traffic of Mumbai with ease making our day out an wonderful experience.  The staff was friendly and helpful and the hotel facilities were excellent.

The hotel location made it easy for us to explore the city. The driver Ahmid was pleasant and navigated the Mumbai traffic with ease making our day out memorable. The hotel was clean with good facilities and the staff were friendly and helpful.
Facilities were eminent and the entire crew was exceptionally efficient. Pleasant experience ü•∞

During my recent one-night stay at The LaLiT Mumbai, I was thoroughly impressed by the hotel's grandeur and hospitality. The moment I entered, the expansive lobby captivated me with its elegant design and ambient lighting, creating a welcoming atmosphere. The staff were exceptionally courteous, ensuring a smooth check-in process and offering assistance throughout my stay.
The hotel's facilities are top-notch... Additionally, the outdoor swimming pool offered a serene environment to relax and enjoy the pleasant Mumbai weather. The highlight of my stay was the breakfast buffet at the 24/7 Restaurant. The spread was extensive, featuring a delightful mix of Indian and international cuisines. From freshly prepared dosas and sambhar to a variety of pastries and cold cuts, every item was flavorful and well-presented. The attentive service by the restaurant staff enhanced the dining experience, making it truly memorable. Overall, The LaLiT Mumbai offers a luxurious and comfortable stay with exceptional service and amenities. I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a premium hotel experience in Mumbai.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at your esteemed hotel for a day, and I must say, it was a delightful experience from start to finish. Your staff's exceptional service and attention to detail truly made my stay memorable.

From the warm welcome at check-in to the seamless check-out process, every interaction with your team was courteous and professional. The room was immaculate and comfortable, providing the perfect sanctuary after a long day of travel.

I would highly recommend Lalit Hotel Mumbai to anyone seeking a luxurious and hospitable stay in the city. Your commitment to excellence is evident in every aspect of the guest experience, and I look forward to returning in the future.

Thank you once again for a fantastic stay.

Warm regards,

Hari kohli

The reception area was beautiful. Room was spacious and clean. Would have been exceptional if the attached balcony would be accessible but I guess they keep it locked. Buffer breakfast was good and lots of variety. Overall a wonderful experience.

We have stayed many times in this prepert since 2011 and found it best always in terms of facilities, cleanliness and staff. The best part of staying here is the breakfast which has spread which is luscious and palatable. Great stay always highly recommended place to stay in Mumbai

We stayed in lalit hotel for 3 nights it was amazing everything very comfortable and quiet room all things neat and clean in the room and high security at entrance every time they checked everything all staff reaspectfully and helpfull we recommended to everyone visit to this hotel
Perfect location

I book this property just for my mother to experience.
She was so happy
Thank you for making my trip memorable
It‚Äôs located next to the sea, is a stone‚Äôs throw away from historical sights and commercial offices, service is excellent - no complaints whatsoever
IM STAYING HERE FOR THR SECOND TIME. THATS ENOUGH TO SAY HOW WELL THIS PROPERTY IS MAINTAINED.
Fabulous place to stay . Firangipani food is awesome as well
Staff are so friendly and supportive, rooms are very clean and comfortable, location is great, facilities are very nice
Overall experience is good but food is extremely expensive whereas taste is ok. 3400 for a dinner buffet doesn't make any sense
good holet at nariman point

Hotels in Mumbai are generally quite expensive, but since it was my first time, I chose a well-known and reliable place. It faces Marine Drive, and it's just within walking distance to the Gateway of India (about 20 minutes).

Every time I entered the hotel, there was a security check. The room was a non-smoking ocean view premier double room. From the window, you can see the Arabian Sea in full view. The size was ample, and the amenities were all provided, with additional items like nail clippers and nail remover as well. The flowers displayed were fresh, and there was a welcome fruit basket as well. 

There was a bathtub, but the shower was only fixed and a rain shower, which made it a bit difficult when I just wanted to wash my feet. When I left my PC on the desk, a screen cleaner was placed there on the second day. Even though I left a tip daily, it was never picked up. On the final day, I left a tip along with a "Thank you" message.

There is a fitness gym, sauna, and an outdoor pool. I received a 90-minute treatment at the spa. It cost 8,000 rupees for the 90 minutes, which is quite pricey, but it felt nice.
Staff is rude, food is average, facilities are below average, hotel staff have no basic etiquettes. They will change the rooms as per their need and will. Worst hotel ever seen.
Great stay with amazing staff and location....room are all clean...food is also good...location is worth stay for and view is breathtaking...

It was a one day stay and I can say it was a perfect stay at Trident! The facilities the staff the ambience everything was up to the mark. However there was some issue regarding electricity in the room for a while however except that everything was on point. Breakfast was the best thing the next morning.!
Had to wait till 4 PM to checkin. They were getting my room ready and didn't even send my luggage to room in time. I had to shout at the staff and then they offered me a different room.

1) First of all there was only one person at the checkin counter, had to wait long to complete checkin. Process took in excess of 20 minutes to complete.
2) while checkin , my credit card was blocked for an amount in excess of room tariff as an usual practise. However, at the time of checkout the person at the checkout counter denied blocking an amount. I had to search for my receipt to prove, only when the blocked amount was released. The entire checkout process took almost 25 minutes.  
3)  Before I explain my third horrible experience, let me clarify that I, Mr. Das and my wife Mrs. Das had made the reservation for a double occupancy room. During our stay we found the TV in the room displaying ‚Äú Welcome Mr. Nair‚Äù. We ignored it assuming it was a technical error. However, during checkout my bill was showing some unknown Mr. Nair as one of the occupants. The manager at the checkout counter could not remove the name of Mr. Nair from the bill  citing system constraint. I find this  obnoxious and unacceptable.  How can my hotel bill have name of an unknown person, this has security implications, leave aside the document becoming invalid for any reimbursement causing financial loss to me.  I waited for over a month to see if there was an apology or correction  from the hotel management.  Since no communication from the hotel management, I can only pity there pathetic customer sensitivity and poor management control.

The location is unbeatable with Stunning views of Arabian Sea if you book sea facing room. The staff was also nice and helpful accommodating all our requests. The facilities were nicely maintained which added to our great experience.

My partner & I had been in Delhi previously and were mildly harrowed by the real-world condition of some of the well-reviewed 3 and 4 star hotels we found. When we arrived in Mumbai, we weren't taking any chances. The Trident absolutely did not disappoint. The location was perfect (there is even a WeWork 5 mins walk away). The facilities, cleanliness and general ambiance were excellent, staff were nothing short of amazing.  To top it off, the ocean view from our room and breakfast made waking up in the Trident a delight, we practically sprinted down to India Jones every morning üëè. One thing worth noting is that you are better off ordering an Uber than having the hotel arrange one (expect approx 4x surcharge). In all, the Trident is a stunning sanctuary for weary travellers in a vibrant, yet chaotic (and wearying) city. Highly recommend!
The stay at Trident is a must if you value hospitality. Everything was perfect and at par.
Excellent location and mesmerising views

The Trident Nariman Point Hotel has the most brilliant location with the most stunning views of the sea and the Mumbai skyline. Couldn't get enough of the breathtaking view. The room was maintained so well, amenities were top notch and the housekeeping was the best I have seen. The breakfast spread was amazing and really enjoyed it. Overall I highly recommend this property for the amazing views, food, hospitality and location!

It was a dream come true to have a staycation at Trident Nariman Point. Having sat at the promenade with my best friend since ages, it was always an aspiration to stay there and look at the queen's necklace, skyline, Arabian sea from a much higher vantage point and what a view it was!

The highlight of the stay was spacious ceiling to floor windows to sit in the armchair and gaze at the Arabian sea and enjoy the view from the comfort of the room. Another was the warm and welcoming service given by almost everyone on the staff. The breakfast buffet was sumptious and delicious.

A suggestion would be to have the pool area open to guests 24*7 or at least till the wee hours of the night so that an insomniac like me can enjoy the cool breeeze and starry view of the sea even at 2 am.

Overall a relaxing, fun filled and excellent staycation at one of the best hotels in Mumbai.

Stayed here for a friend's wedding. Was really good in terms of location, staff service and handling, breakfast and also the room with its view. Maybe the check in could be improved to be a tad bit faster and the crowd management for breakfast could have been better.

We loved our stay here at Trident, amazing view, great staff and hospitality.  Thank you for upgrading our room without even requesting it, that was so kind of management.  Wonderful breakfast too.  

I would like a microwave in the room though, that would be nice.  I would like to reheat my food, even if it is from downstairs.   Thank you.

Located right on the best part of marine drive. From a high floor you look straight into the water, not road or sidewalk. Staff are super friendly. Buffet breakfast is good with a lot of made to order choices as well. The pan Asian restaurant was excellent. They drop you in a mini Cooper to nearby places such as Colaba or Fort. Or you can Uber it for two dollars

Most of the time I ended up in a fully crowded cabin going to a floor I did not want to go. Amazing view from the roof! Nice pool area.

The staff were exceptionally helpful and charming. From the moment they collected us from the airport and checked us in in our room, until we left, they couldn‚Äôt have been nicer or more efficient.  The pool was delightful with lovely views over the sea. The whole hotel felt relaxing to be in.  Fantastic breakfast buffet with delicious food and lots of choice, again great service from all the staff.  Beds were comfortable however we would have preferred a softer lighter duvet.  That said it was the only thing.  Even the shower gel smells good.

The property is great, most of the staff is wonderful, but, as a package, it is unnecessarily expensive.

My wife was visiting me for one night and the charge for stay and breakfast is almost a third of the room rate that I paid. I didn't pay that exuberant a price at the St. Regis, which is way more luxurious than this.

The other irritating thing is that there is always a line for breakfast. Fortunately, I found a faster way by directly going to the Mexican Room. Russell, an employee of the hotel for over 2 decades, was exceptional in his service there. However, the other younger staff is mostly in a hurry and they made mistakes in getting my order of eggs a couple of times. 

One big turn off is that the area under the bed is dusty and dirty - not being cleaned regularly, and, even being overlooked by the supervisors.

It took over 30 minutes to register. A 5 stars hotel having Nescaf√© bags, the local newspapers was delivered twice but we had to ask for it. We were having  a coffee with snacks, around 12 noon, so whilst drinking our coffee they were cleaning the floor we had to move to another chairs so they could do it. Never, never, I have seen cleaning whilst customers are eating. The staff not that friendly.

2 nights at the club room for work. Everything was a breeze. Complimentary transport for short rides around the hotel, nicely sized rooms, warm and professional service. I‚Äôd say that the water pressure is gentler than ideal, and it would be good to have a shower handle too (than just a wall faucet).
The swimming pool. Excellent location.

We lost of baggage and pyjamas was offered by the hotel staff , we were extremely grateful for the thoughtful act, some of the staff remember us in person and was very friendly . We were very happy with our stay and feel welcomed.

This is a typical high end big city hotel. It lived up to the expectations one has of a such an hotel. Service was great, food delicious, the location was great and there was an excellent fitness center and salon. We used the fitness center daily and never felt crowded. I had my hair done at the salon and though it was pricey, the service was fine. We especially liked the restaurant. We love Indian food and both breakfast and dinner buffets had a great many choices, all well prepared.

The initial room that I checked into had some issues with bathroom door lock, bath tub, wash basin etc. When I informed the staff, they were very accommodating and immediately shifted me to a different room (upgraded one :) And I was surprised to beautiful flowers and an apology note in the room when I returned. The onsite manager also apologized in person when we were checking out of the hotel. The location is amazing and the service is excellent. I am definitely going to recommend the hotel to my friends and family. A BIG Thank you.

Great location, excellent food and excellent service. Connected to the esteemed Oberoi Hotel, which is more luxurious. Rooms are spacious. However, rooms are quite old and need an upgrade. I recommend you get the ocean view room for an amazing view of the ocean.

Trident Nariman Point is a twin hotel to the flagship hotel - The Oberoi of the Oberoi Group. Location of the hotel is in business district on the famous Marine Drive. Service is Oberoi Standard and always Excellent. Its a very good value for money.

I enjoyed myself during my stay at Trident a nariman point. 

Firstly I like the high level of security performed by the staff. Although this can be seen in other 5 star hotels. One of my friends bought a dagger from Amritsar for religious purpose and the Hotel staff informed that for safety purposes they would keep it till we check out. Couldn't agree with them more.

Check -in was fast and we were given an option to upgrade ( to top up the difference) as it came with free wifi. I agreed and also signed up for membership. The room was what I had expected, views of the sea just by lying on my bed. The room was spacious and clean. 

One of the nights, I planned to have dinner at Taj president hotel and enquired on how to get there. The staff went a step further and informed me that he will make a reservation as it could be crowded. I was impressed. 

Location wise, I feel it's near to the tourist attractions which is a short auto ride away. I went to Mumbai during the mosoon period and whenever I came out of the hotel, the wind was so strong. 

Overall, I had a great time in the hotel. I used their gym and was quite happy with their equipments. I would stay again at Trident nariman the next time I am in Mumbai or at any of their sister properties in India.

We had a pleasant stay at the hotel. We are offered the standard upgrade for Club Room + Wifi + Airport Transfer for Rs3500 per day but we decline. We were alternatively offered an upgrade to sea view room for a small fee. We happily accepted. I think the Wifi charge of Rs1000 per day is not suitable. I can get my mobile data roaming for USD12 per day which is half the cost and available everywhere I go in Mumbai. For Rs1000, I am only enabling wifi during my limited hours in my room. Wifi should be made complimentary like most hotels or offer basic access for free and premium access for a fee. During checkout there was a mistake of billing us for one breakfast and I need to use Agoda voucher to show my room charge include breakfast. They front desk cancel this item in the bill after I show them the Agoda Voucher. In general, we had good stay at this hotel.
We were disappointed by the service and the sense that you needed to give a generous tip in order to be well served.

I booked in for my parents. And they enjoyed their stay there. The breakfast was fantastic. They had a room with the Ocean View. Location was perfect. The best part of the hotel is the customer service. The staffs of Trident Nariman Point were too good.

I was generally impressed with the hotel; staff were very helpful indeed. The room was very comfortable with a good shower. Breakfast was of a good standard with many options.. I really enjoyed Mumbai and it was nice to have a calm refuge away from the hustle and bustle of the city...only issue was you had to pay for WIFI. This should have been included.

One of the good hotels in the area. Our stay was comfortable and peaceful, much due to the friendliness and helpfulness of hotel staff. Food was delicious and the location of the hotel is one of the best in the area. We would give it total good 4.

Good Stay!!

In my previous five visits to India, I never managed to make it to Mumbai. So, I decided to spend the weekend in Mumbai before head off to a class in New Delhi. My original plan was to stay at the Taj; but the Trident had a promotional offer that was too good to pass up. I am very happy with my choice! The Trident Hotel is sleek and modern with a spectacular sea view. The staff couldn't have been nicer or more professional and helpful! Upon registering, I was offered an upgrade to club for only RS3,500 per night. Usually, these offers are rip-offs; but in the Trident's case it was a great bargain. For my extra RS3,500 (GBP 35) per night I got: a room with a great sea view, breakfast in the club lounge (The breakfast is made to order, not a buffet under hot lamp deal.), h'orderves and drinks in the evening, a free airport transfer that the staff allowed my to trade for a free four hour private tour of Mumbai (BTW, the tour was excellent.), free WiFi (I hate paying for WiFi. There's no reason in this day and age why all hotels don't provide free WiFi for their guests. In a five star hotel, charging for WiFi is mercenary!), and finally express checkout on the club (28th) floor. My room was great. The only criticism I have is that the drawers were small. I am not a clothes horse; but I bet a lot of travelers who book five star hotels are. Also, I was traveling alone. If I was accompanied, there would have probably been some contention over draw space. This is a very minor problem that the Trident can easily fix. The location, Nariman Point, is perfect. If you don't want to eat in the hotel, there are plenty of restaurants within walking distance. If I ever return to Mumbai, Trident Hotel Nariman Point will be my first choice!
I have found non better in this location
ok

Wonderful,  I was there to celebrate my daughter birthday,  n they bought a surprise cake n flowers for my daughter with birthday card in my hotel room with all their staff.  It is really very nice of them n appreciating.

EXCELLENT HOTEL FOR THE 2 DAYS SHORT VISIT. ROOM SERVICE WAS VEEY FAST WHICH WAS THE MOST SATISFYING EXPERIENCE.

Good - Spacious clean room. Great breakfast, near enough to walk the distance to the Gateway of India, the Taj Hotel (also the ferry boarding point for the Elephanta Island). Similarly to the main shopping street. Great roof top pool - wished we brought along the swim gear.

Not so great - only staircase access to the breakfast area (below the level of the lobby) that we are aware of - makes it difficult to get there - I had recently injured my knees).

I was upgraded on arrival, which meant I had a higher floor view and a superb room.  Staff were attentive and helpful, breakfast was varied and delicious, and Club facilities were excellent.  I look forward to my next stay here in this hotel on the sea front.  Enjoyed walking to Kala Ghoda and Fort from here and along the sea front to many neighboring restaurants and shops.

I loved this hotel.  Spent one night and wished I had booked 3.  Outstanding staff - fabulous comfortable room with every modern convenience including electronic black out shade and CD player with flat screen TV.  Lovely bathroom with great products and even a plate with oranges, linen napkin and knife on the desk when I arrived.  Excellent value.  Verandah lounge was nice with a buffet - small finger foods etc. for a good price and again, excellent quality of food and service by staff.  Late checkout until 6pm at no extra charge.  Nice but cold rooftop pool with comfy lounge chairs, plush towels.  Steam room and change area with bath and hair products.  Everywhere was exceptionally clean for India, most impressed.  Highly recommend this hotel.

I have stayed in Trident Mumbai a few times before. I was always happy and comfortable there.    The staff are excellent,service is very good,and i am very comfortable.When I am in Mumbai again i would choose Trident again.A big thank you to all staff of Trident Mumbai.Bye.

Trident Nariman Point Mumbai Hotel absolutely exceeded my expectations. They have the best customer service I have ever experienced in my travels. I had to check-in earlier than the usual check-in time because of my flight schedule and because I had to wait a bit for check-in, hotel reception was kind enough to give me complimentary wifi services as well as free lunch buffet! Aside from that, all hotel staff were very courteous and attentive to guests' needs. You'll really feel like a VIP in every corner of the hotel. Also, the hotel's breakfast buffet has a very good selection of food. When staying in Mumbai, Trident Nariman Point Hotel will truly offer the best hotel experience you could ever ask for =)
